Content: "Yes, welcome to Eldoria, the heart of our humble beginnings. Here, every adventurer starts their journey."
Option1: "Excuse me, are you the village elder?"

Content: "Indeed, I am. I see a spark of potential in your eyes. This village will prepare you for the challenges ahead."
"To your left is the General Store, where you can buy supplies. To the right is the Training Ground, where you can hone your skills."
"Complete quests for the villagers. Each task will teach you something new and help you grow. Speak to Mara at the quest board for your first assignment."
Option1: "Hi, are you Mara? The elder said I should speak with you about quests."

Content: "Yes, that's me! Hereâ€™s your first quest: collect five healing herbs from the forest. It will help you learn about the local flora."
Option1: "What's that glowing fountain in the center of the village?"

Content: "That's the Healing Fountain. It restores your health and energy. Many adventurers visit it after a long day of quests."
If you need a story, come to me.
If you need to buy something, please contact me.
